short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: don't let your opponent's ELO throw your game off

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides your opponents ELO on chess.com so that you can focus on the game without underestimating low level opponents or worrying about high level opponents
